text: Sebastiano Bianchi was an Italian engraver, active c.1580. He produced plates of devotional subjects. Among others is a print representing the Emblems of our Saviour's Sufferings, with Angels. ==References== * Category:Italian engravers Category:Renaissance engravers Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:16th-century Italian people
title: Sebastiano Bianchi
